Text: Guys, I don't know what's wrong with you all. C'mon SEED ! Please share and keep up with the spirit of TPB!
OK ! I am Off Grid. I am seeding continuously nearly 5 times the size of the torrent. All I get is HARs (Hit & Runs ). Does anybody blame me for going off the grid ?
Number of seeders has come down to 2 from 12 and there are 41 leechers now. Should I seed forever, without help from TPB members ? Oh ! Well !!!
OK Guys it's 2 AM, Nightie Night ! I am off grid till next time .

OK Guys this was my last torrent. I am now retiring from TPB for personal reasons. It had been fun being with TPB and all it's awesome members.

Goodbye and Good Luck ! God Bless !
Sad to loose a terrific baymember.

Ah, A Sad News, I Appreciate For All your Uploads, and about seeding the torrents i should say each uploader has that problem.

Thank You! (^_^)

congrats on ur skull
sad a good member is leaving
